text.div:
Message Header Type

Message Header Types for Integrated Transitions of Care (iTOC) Messages

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.health.nsw.gov.au/fhir/ehealth/itoc/v1.0/CodeSystem/messagetypes
    CodeDisplay
    medication-listThis message is a medication list
  • Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.health.nsw.gov.au/fhir/ehealth/itoc/v1.0/CodeSystem/messagetypes
    CodeDisplay
    medication-historyThis message is a medication history
  • Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.health.nsw.gov.au/fhir/ehealth/itoc/v1.0/CodeSystem/messagetypes
    CodeDisplay
    medication-administration-recordThis message is a medication administration record
  • Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.health.nsw.gov.au/fhir/ehealth/itoc/v1.0/CodeSystem/messagetypes
    CodeDisplay
    reconciled-medication-listThis message is a reconciled medication list
